In Serbia, a Belgrade court rules that accused war criminal Ratko Mladic...
...is fit to be extradited to The Hague.
In Libya, Gadhafi loyalists launch a new battle to recapture rebel - held Misrata.
South Sudanese officials say 80,000 have fled Abyei since northern troops seized the region.
Thousands gather in Athens, Greece to protest economic crisis.
In Egypt, thousands converge on Cairo's Tahrir Square...
...and call for a second revolution to push for deeper reforms.
Astronauts finish repairs on the International Space Station...
...and reach 1000 space walking hours in their careers.
